mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id,trip_no, subject, content, hit, regist_time) values (#{userId}, #{tripNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select * from board order by board_no desc
select b.board_no, b.user_id, b.trip_no ,b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.regist_time, u.name from board b, user u where b.user_id = u.id and b.board_no = #{boardNo}
